<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataCW extends data { const CODE = 'CW'; const PREFIX = 599; const REGION = 'South America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[34]1|60|(?:7|9\d)\d)\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '9(?:4(?:3[0-5]|4[14]|6\d)|50\d|7(?:2[014]|3[02-9]|4[4-9]|6[357]|77|8[7-9])|8(?:3[39]|[46]\d|7[01]|8[57-9]))\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '953[01]\d{4}|9(?:5[12467]|6[5-9])\d{5}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '60[0-2]\d{4}'=>array( 'shared_cost', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
